en-US.summary: Put your math skills to the test, with three levels: easy, intermediate, and advanced!
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Quick Math to start a quiz
en-US.name: Quick Math
en-US.description:
For endless fun and a great mental workout, Quick Math puts your arithmetic skills to the test, with three levels: basic, intermediate, and advanced. Each level contains addition, division, subtraction, and multiplication questions, and after a game, you'll get your score.

The number of questions depends on the level you choose, with up to 30 questions for the advanced level.

Quick Math can be great for a morning workout, dinner time fun with your family, or as a competitive evening game.
To start, just say "Alexa, launch Quick Math" or "Alexa, open Quick Math"".

To hear Alexa repeat the question, just say 'repeat'. At any time, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
Other instructions include:
-Play Easy Quiz: Set the level to easy.
-Play Intermediate Quiz: Set the level to intermediate.
-Play Advanced Quiz: Set the level to advanced.
-Start Quiz: When you're ready, you can start the quiz once a level is enabled. 
-Repeat: Alexa will repeat the current question.
-Stop: End the current game.
